title: Timeless Temiar
creator_credit: Zain Hussain and Malayan Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the life of the Aborigines of the Temiar tribe of Northern Perak, Malaya. They lead a civilised life when left in their own environment and make full use of jungle resources.
description: Shows the life of the Aborigines of the Temiar tribe of Northern Perak, Malaya. They lead a civilised life when left in their own environment and make full use of jungle resources.
